user_profile: User 267 is an active and socially engaged adult male who enjoys spending time at bars and restaurants with friends. With a college education and a middle socioeconomic status, they balance a busy lifestyle that revolves around fitness and social activities. User 267 frequently visits gyms, indicating a strong commitment to their health and fitness. They also enjoy watching movies, often going to theaters on weekends. Coffee shops serve as regular leisure spots where they unwind and socialize. Music venues play an important role in their social calendar, reflecting an appreciation for live entertainment. User 267's extroverted nature makes them thrive in social settings, while their conscientious side ensures they maintain a healthy routine. They are open to new experiences, frequently exploring diverse culinary options, including burrito places and German restaurants. Future visits may include venues related to fitness, social dining, and late-night entertainment, considering their frequent activity at POIs like bars (IDs 63, 100, 3110) and gyms (ID 983).
